_aChangeLog.text: Fixed bug at the T-Spawn - "you are out of buy zone" (initial error of the author of the original CS:GO map)

_sText:
OUTPOST

Hostage Rescue Map for Counter-Strike: Source

CS:GO original map creator: Oliver
CS:S map editor: Niko
Navigation Mesh editor: Meurglis3

High quality port for CS:S of stylish and atmospheric same-named map from CS:GO by Oliver, inspired by setting of the famous sci-fi film from John Carpenter.
This port contains a few small design and visual changes compared to the original source, which were made for better map appearance and maximal gameplay intensity.

Story:
   An important scientific discovery was made at the Antarctic research station. And the international smugglers syndicate immediately showed interest in the discovered artifacts...

P.S. ~ Smash up the tractor... and kill the rest of the dogs :-)
